name: Two sides of a coin (knownledge)
description:
Created for ZenoJam linked here: https://itch.io/jam/zenojam

Just a typical platformer with the main gimmick of having two dimensions you can switch between by tossing a coin, this is my first game jam game so expect several glitches and lack of length (about 4 levels)

This was a collaboration between two other people (NorthKarma and Akalo22) however I can't credit them properly as they have nothing I can link to.

Coding and level design done by me in unreal engine 4

Art assets made by northkarma

Sound design by Akalo
